quote: Not at all. Cooking is cool. I’ll make you one shaped like the moon.”“Why the moon?”“Because you remind me of the moon,” he said, and looked into his bowl. Sarah blushed.
quote_letters: NOT AT ALL COOKING IS COOL ILL MAKE YOU ONE SHAPED LIKE THE MOONWHY THE MOONBECAUSE YOU REMIND ME OF THE MOON HE SAID AND LOOKED INTO HIS BOWL SARAH BLUSHED
